content.title: ICMR- Post Doctoral Fellowship
content.details: ICMR- Post Doctoral Fellowship (ICMR-PDF) Scheme is being instituted to foster high-quality research opportunities for promising fresh Ph.D./MD/MS holders in the cutting-edge areas of basic science, communicable and non-communicable diseases, and reproductive health including nutrition at ICMR Institutes /Centers. Special focus will be on fundamental research in areas of science and other priority areas identified by ICMR from time to time. ICMR intends to offer fifty (50) such fellowships every year for working in ICMR Institutes/Centers with state-of-the-art R&D facilities.
benefits: Consolidated fellowship of ₹65,000/- per month plus House Rent Allowance (HRA) as per Govt. of India rule and Non-Practicing allowance (NPA) as admissible.
25% of the contingency grant can be used for travel including per diem expenses (only for National travel, related to ICMR-PDF proposed research work only).
Accommodation may be provided by ICMR Institutes/Centers, if available.
ICMR-PDFs will be entitled to medical benefits and leave as per the ICMR rules for JRF/Research Associates.
eligibility: ICMR-PDF is open to Indian nationals only.
Fresh PhDs/MD/MS within three years of completing their Ph.D./MD/MS degree (awarded) as on the last date of the application.
The Post-Doctoral proposed research work should be the continuation of the Ph.D. or MD/MS research work.
The maximum age limit is 32 years, relaxable up to 5 years in case of SC/ST/OBC/PH and women candidates.
For deserving candidates age can be relaxed maximum up to a maximum of 3 years based on earlier work done, publications, awards, etc.
The PDF Guide should have the minimum designation of Scientist-C grade.
Postgraduate medical students are also permitted to carry out ICMR’s PDF in MCI-recognized postgraduate medical colleges.
content.application_process: Offline. Eligible candidates can visit the official website of ICMR and download the application form. Applications must be sent to the Director General, ICMR Headquarters, New Delhi.
documents_required: Attested copy of School Leaving/ High School/Secondary School Certificate (for date of birth)
Attested copies of Mark Sheets/Grade Cards & Degrees
Attested copy of the Caste certificate, if applicable
Attested copies of Letter(s) of Acceptance for paper(s) accepted for publication & pre-prints
Testimonials from two Referees (One should be Ph.D. Guide)
Plagiarism Check Report verified by ICMR-RIO

faqs.question: What is the “ICMR- Post Doctoral Fellowship” Scheme?
faqs.answer: ICMR- Post Doctoral Fellowship (ICMR-PDF) Scheme is being instituted to foster high-quality research opportunities for promising fresh Ph.D./MD/MS holders.

faqs.question: Which is the implementing agency of this scheme?
faqs.answer: Indian Council of Medical Research, Government of India.

faqs.question: Who are eligible to apply under the scheme?
faqs.answer: Fresh PhDs/MD/MS within three years of completing their Ph.D./MD/MS degree can apply.

faqs.question: What is the number of fellowships awarded annually?
faqs.answer: ICMR intends to offer fifty (50) fellowships every year.

faqs.question: What is the maximum age criterion to apply under the scheme?
faqs.answer: The maximum age limit is 32 years, relaxable up to 5 years for certain categories.

faqs.question: What is the criterion of selection?
faqs.answer: Selection will be made through an interview of short-listed candidates by a specially constituted Selection Committee.
